game.name: DK Online
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: DK Online은 3D 판타지 테마의 MMORPG로, 대규모 PvP 전투에 중점을 두고 있는 게임입니다. 당신은 강력한 영웅, 신들만이 능가 할 수있는 드래곤 나이츠로서 세계를 지키라는 임무가 주어질 것입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DK Online, a fantasy-themed classic MMORPG, invites you to combat monsters, engage in intense PvP, and prove your skills by leveling up. You can magically transform your look into stylish characters. Conquer achievements and explore a vast world as a Dragon Knight. Massive rewards await you!

reviewHighlights.text: So many issues with this game, from logging in, to it asking you to keep resetting your password to the P2W and more.. just skip.
3 different premium accounts giving stat buffs :-D you can high five AION 2!
